name: The Saltstrand Horror (working title)
description:
WASD to move and SPACE to fish.

ATTENTION, this project is blatantly unfinished. I just wanted somewhere to track its progress. I work a full time job and have little time to actually sit down and develop. 

This will one day, my own procrastination willing, will be a horror game about a fisherman who dredges up an eldritch beast that he must feed whilst also trying to support his family.
